mapper.select: select patient.name as name, patient.age as age, chart.disease as disease, (select employee.name from employee where employee.id = chart.doctor_id and employee.id in (select id from doctor)) as doctor_name, (select name from department where chart.dept_id = department.id) dept_name, patient.sex as sex, patient.familydis as familydis, chart.id as id from chart, (select id, name, age, sex, familydis from patient) patient where chart.PATIENT_ID = patient.id
